question:
Which among the following statements is/are correct?
  1. A point bar is an area of depositionÂ 
  2. A cut bank is an area of erosion.
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation: A point bar is a depositional feature made of alluvium which accumulates at the inside bend of the river below the slip-off slope. A point bar is an area of deposition. A cut bank is an area of erosion.
